articles.description: The results of a new scientific study suggest that huge sections of an alien planet known as Theia may reside deep within our planet, close to the Earth's core, following a cataclysmic collision that took place 4.5 million years ago.

articles.title: What is STEVE, and how is it different from the aurora? - Space.com
articles.description: Only formally discovered in 2016, STEVE is a mysterious atmospheric phenomenon that is linked to yet distinct from the aurora. Here's where to look for it in the night sky.
